column6: - Nobody else would have done it - because nobody else would have the nerve! Loki's crew comes together to crack the deepest dungeons of Asgardia itself! - It's the ultimate caper - but is there one plot twist too many for even the God of Trickery to handle? - This movie rated :( for tears before bedtime.
column8: | writer:Al Ewing | penciller (cover):Jenny Frison | artist:Lee Garbett
